system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 50, Deadeye Shot, Sharpshooter 
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Offence
system.effect: Once per Combat Encounter, character can spend a Fate Point to change the result of a 1 on a single damage die from a ranged attack to a 10. This can then inflict Righteous Fury as normal.
